articles.title: Where to watch Notre Dame vs. Indiana, TV channel, prediction, pick, spread, College Football Playoff odds - CBS Sports
articles.description: In-state foes Indiana and Notre Dame meet for the first time in over 30 years to usher in the 12-team CFP era
articles.content: No. 7 seed Notre Dame hosts No. 10 seed Indiana to kick off the 12-team College Football Playoff era in South Bend, Indiana, in what will be a historic moment as the landscape across college football… [+4560 chars]

articles.title: Delphi murders: Richard Allen sentenced to 130 years for Indiana deaths - BBC.com
articles.description: Richard Allen was convicted last month for the "Delphi murders" of Liberty German, who was 14, and Abigail Williams, 13, in 2017.
articles.content:
Richard Allen, a US man convicted last month of killing two teenagers in the state of Indiana, has been sentenced to 130 years behind bars for their deaths.
